briefTitle: Evaluating and Comparing Two Surgical Methods for Treatment of Early Stage Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Measuring the Effect of Additional Tumor Cavity Margins Excision at the Time of Breast Conserving Surgery for Stage 0, I, II, and III Breast Cancer Patients on Re-excision Rate, Cosmetic Results and Total Costs
conditions: Breast Neoplasms, Breast Cancer, Breast Tumors, Cancer of Breast, Cancer of the Breast, Human Mammary Carcinoma, Neoplasms, Breast
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparing 2 surgical methods for treatment of early stage breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female Patients with the diagnosis of Stage 0, I, II and III breast cancer diagnosed/treated at the AVON Foundation Comprehensive Breast Center (AFCBC) of Grady Memorial Hospital
* Age: no limit

Exclusion Criteria:

* Stage IV breast cancers
